title: Ep 244: Reasonably Shady Heauxs (Ft. Gizelle Bryant & Robyn Dixon)
itunes:title: Ep 244: Reasonably Shady Heauxs (Ft. Gizelle Bryant & Robyn Dixon)
description:
This week’s episode the ladies are joined by Gizelle Bryant and Robyn Dixon aka “the Green Eyed Bandits” from Bravo’s Real Housewives of Potomac and the Reasonably Shady Podcast on Black Effect. The shows starts off with some reasonable and some shady ice breaker questions. Kink of the week is introduced as Gizelle recently shared something she often does in the bedroom that simply could be arousing to some. We are discussing Eproctophilia this week…GET INTO IT! We then discuss sex in the news where a high school administered a sex survey without consent from the parents. While both housewives are raising growing children, we discuss how they have managed to discuss the birds and bees with their kids. Later we get into their relationships. Have they really forgave their partners? Is cheating NOT a dealbreaker for them? && doubling back to their ex husbands after filing a divorce…Where they do that at??


Get your tickets NOW! WHOREible Decisions is back on the road! Get your tickets at Whorehive.com

Friday 12/3 Los Angeles

Friday 12/17 Atlanta
